## Creating Community

Many of GMRI's social forums like "gmri reads" or "quant"  began from the efforts of individuals that wished to create those groups. GMRI encourages and supports these initiatives. These can be started in however form is  most appropriate, and are often accompanied by their own slack channels and some announcement to the research team or staff during research or all-staff meetings.
